data.actual_result: The invite link disappears (shows blank besides "discord. gg") and the "You are being rate limited" toast appears
data.expected_result: No rate limit should be possible as you aren't requesting any new resource from the api
data.short_description: Rotating the screen several times in the invite creation screen causes the generated invite link to temporarily vanish + you are being rate limited
data.steps_to_repro: - In a server where you can create invites, tap the Create invite button - Rotate your device a few times - Wait a few seconds and observe
